br.com.caelum.vraptor.proxy
Interface MethodInvocation<T>

Type Parameters:
T - type of the proxy that will have its method calls intercepted
All Known Implementing Classes:
ExceptionRecorder
public interface MethodInvocation<T>

Callback for method invocations on proxies.

Author:
Fabio Kung

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object intercept(T proxy, java.lang.reflect.Method method, java.lang.Object[] args, SuperMethod superMethod)
          Executes for all method invocations on proxies.
 

Method Detail

intercept

java.lang.Object intercept(T proxy,
                           java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                           java.lang.Object[] args,
                           SuperMethod superMethod)
Executes for all method invocations on proxies.

Parameters:
proxy - that received the method call.
method - called.
args - given to the method call.
superMethod - allowing calls to the overriden original method. A super method call only makes sense for concrete class proxies.
Returns:
the method call return.
